title: Changing schools: 1912-1985 (A)
creator_contributor_role: Penny Robins Video Projects, production company
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Parent participation
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Mainstreaming in education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped children - Education
description: Using archival footage this video raises a variety of issues relevant to contemporary educational debate in both Victoria and Australia at large. Topics addressed include the need for education to change, the role of government schools, equal educational opportunity, the integration of disabled children, Aboriginal education, multiculturalism and parent participation.
